user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we want to create a fun playlist to keep us entertained. Can you provide me with the details of a playlist called 'Road Trip Vibes' from Soundcloud? Additionally, give me the top 10 greatest R&B/Hip-Hop songs of all time to add to our playlist.

TaskList.description: Fetch the details of the playlist 'Road Trip Vibes' from Soundcloud.
Retrieve a list of the top 10 greatest R&B/Hip-Hop songs of all time.
Combine the songs from 'Road Trip Vibes' playlist and the top 10 greatest R&B/Hip-Hop songs into a final playlist.
